title: PBE Admin Launcher NotLaunching
body:
Found out I cannot access my PBE account as there's an error saying theres an application error. That it couldn't start correctly (0xc0150004)
Ive uses lol.admin to try to open it and it still doesn't. To top that off I can't access my PBE account (not sure if you can in the first place) cannot be accessed in the forums to write a ticket. Does anyone know is this a problem with my computer? Or can I write a ticket using my normal league account to report what's happening to my PBE account? (also, i've never shared my PBE account with anyone so no one should have access to it)

replies.body: You probably need to setup [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for the PBE client as well. Run through the steps in that guide to get those setup, and let me know if it works or not ^_^
